channel.title: Need help on creating a game
channel.description:
Okay, well a long time ago my father created a 3D racing sort of game. I don't know if this is the right place to ask... But I can't use Unity... :[ But does anyone know how to create say... A 3D racing game like the back ground and all can be black and you could jump ramps?
Will Rep++!

item.title: Need help on creating a game
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I recommended Slick for starting out, that’s just me though.

www.java-gaming.org is a good community I found for Java game development. I’m not affiliated with them, just a member. They could probably have more exact answers for you, or at least enlighten you on what to do.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on creating a game

item.title: Need help on creating a game
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

You should learn how to use Unity. If we tell you how to to everything, it isn’t your game anymore.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on creating a game

item.title: Need help on creating a game
item.dc:creator: @ictbguud ictbguud
item.description:
@ictbguud wrote:

Actually, that’s a brilliant idea…

Do you know any way I could create it? And if I may ask… Could I make it into a ROM for a emulator on the PC?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on creating a game

item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Your going to need to start small. Try to just create a simple 2D racing game first. 3D
